sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"废话，胡说"之意。
means: nonsense ： 指因愚蠢或无知而出现的一切荒唐和无意义的言语。
rubbish ： 从本义垃圾引申而指毫无价值的话或思想。

sentence.Network_en: He had been unwittingly deluded by their mystical nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不知不觉被他们故弄玄虚的胡说八道给骗了。

sentence.Network_en: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

sentence.Network_en: She is fascinated by algebra while he considers it meaningless nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对代数非常着迷，而他却认为代数毫无意义。

jx.jx_en_mean: reduce the value of something to a ridiculous degree

lj.lj_ly: the proposal would make a nonsense of their plans.
lj.lj_ls: 那项提议会让他们的计划变得荒诞不稽。

entry.def: If you say that something spoken or written is nonsense, you mean that you consider it to be untrue or silly.

example.ex: Most orthodox doctors however dismiss this as complete nonsense.
example.tran: 但大多数传统的医生认为此说法完全是胡说八道。
所有那些关于爱情的充满诗情画意的假话

entry.tran: 愚蠢的举动;冒失(或轻浮)的行为
entry.def: You can use nonsense to refer to something that you think is foolish or that you disapprove of.

example.ex: Surely it is an economic nonsense to deplete the world of natural resources...
example.tran: 耗尽世界的自然资源毋庸置疑是愚蠢的经济行为。

example.ex: I think there is a limit to how much of this nonsense people are going to put up with.
example.tran: 我想人们对这种胡闹总有一个承受极限。

entry.def: You can refer to spoken or written words that do not mean anything because they do not make sense as nonsense .

example.ex: ...a children's nonsense poem by Charles E Carryl.
example.tran: 查尔斯·E.卡里尔写的一首儿童打油诗

entry.tran: 使变得荒唐;使失去意义
entry.def: To make a nonsense of something or to make nonsense of it means to make it seem ridiculous or pointless.

example.ex: The fighting made a nonsense of peace pledges made in London last week...
example.tran: 这场战斗使上周在伦敦所作的和平承诺变成一纸空文。

example.ex: It makes nonsense of our own rules governing laws of adoption in this country.
example.tran: 这使将我们自己的规定凌驾于该国收养法之上的做法显得十分荒谬。

means.word_mean: 1. a message that seems to convey no meaning
2. ornamental objects of no great value

auth_sentence.content: Forget all this nu rave, nu wave nonsense.
auth_sentence.res_content: Forget all this nu rave, nu wave nonsense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Forget all this nu rave, nu wave nonsense.

auth_sentence.content: This type of 'energy' nonsense is truly comical.
auth_sentence.res_content: This type of 'energy' nonsense is truly comical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This type of 'energy' nonsense is truly comical.

auth_sentence.content: Don't be stupid and believe in magical nonsense.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't be stupid and believe in magical nonsense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't be stupid and believe in magical nonsense.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ibility具备……性质的→adj.感觉[力],敏感性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明智的,达理的;可觉察的,明显的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ible能……的→能感觉的→明显的
sens感觉+itive……的→adj.[to]敏感的,易受伤害的;灵敏的
non不,无+sens感觉+e→无感觉,无意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 感觉, 感情, 感动
stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+ation表名词→n.感觉, 感情, 感动
sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到

stems_affixes.value_cn: 敏感, 灵敏[度], 灵敏性

stems_affixes.word_buile: sens感觉+e→n.感官;感觉;判断力;意义 v.觉得,意识到

Sentence.sentence: It seems very good for Harvard to honor such a high profile popularizer of the irrational…… at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world.
They are tolerant of political and religious nonsense

sentences.en: She left out three words when she copied the sentence and the result was nonsense.
sentences.cn: 她抄这个句子时漏了三个词, 结果使这句话毫无意义。

means.word_mean: 愚蠢的行为; 无聊的事物

jushi.english: She left out three words when she copied the sentence and the result was nonsense.
jushi.chinese: 她抄这个句子时漏了三个词,结果使这句话毫无意义。
